entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness after midnight then 30 percent chance of flurries before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 5:23 PM EDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow or rain. High 8.
entry.summary: Periods of snow changing to a few rain showers near noon and ending late in the afternoon then cloudy. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h near noon. High 8. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:23 PM EDT Sunday 2 April 2023
